author: andreypz
body:
Hi,

This commit is to add reduced gsf tracks collection to miniAOD. The tracks added are:
 * The main track of GsfElectronCore
 * All ambiguous tacks of GsfElectron (if there are any)

Change in the file size was estimated with *test/patMiniAOD_standard_cfg.py* script on two RelVal samples: **TTbar** and **ZtoEE**, based on 500 events:
 * In TTbar sample the increase is from 32470 Kbytes to 32524 Kbytes (0.17%). Increase per event: 108 bytes.
 * In ZEE sample the increase from 25427 Kbytes to 25460 Kbytes (0.13%). Increase per event: 65 bytes.

This addition was presented in [X-POG meeting on 18-Oct-2016](https://indico.cern.ch/event/575788/), in [this slides](https://indico.cern.ch/event/575788/contributions/2343082/attachments/1356862/2051472/Zenz-DalitzMiniAODNeeds-XPOG-v1.pdf).  
This was also privately discussed with @arizzi @gpetruc @sethzenz @bendavid.

The intent for this code to be used for miniAOD of 2017 data/MC and legacy re-miniAOD of 2016 data.

This supersedes pull #19597
title: Adding reduced GsfTracks to miniAOD
